main event: A housewife observed a gold box approximately 10 feet above cars while driving at night in Salem, New York.
interesting points: The object was stationary for about 5 minutes before ascending silently., The witness was driving past the object when it was first seen., The observation duration was a total of 7 minutes., The object was described as a rectangular gold box measuring 12 to 14 inches long by 3 to 4 inches tall., The weather conditions were reported as very clear and cold at the time of the sighting.
witness description: 66-year-old housewife from Salem, New York, described as reliable.
